text: Tom Hoover is a pioneering American gasser drag racer.Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars (Cartech, 2003), pp.180-6. Driving a DeSoto-powered 1957 Plymouth, he won NHRA's first ever C/Gas Altered (C/GA) national title at Detroit Dragway in 1960. His winning pass was 14.33 seconds at .Davis, p.182. He won no other NHRA gasser titles.Davis, pp.180-6. ==References== ==Sources== *Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars, North Branch, MN: Cartech, 2003, pp. 180–6. Category:Dragster drivers Category:American racing drivers
title: Tom Hoover (drag racer)
